decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (099-77357:01, 099-77357:02 (Existing house left elevation), 099-77357:03, 099-77357:04 (Existing house right elevation), 099-77357:01/A, 099-77357:02 (Proposed house left elevation), 099-77357:03/A, 099-77357:04 (Proposed house right elevation), Unnumbered design and access statement, Unnumbered location plan, Unnumbered block plan, received 14/08/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The brickwork to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey side and rear infill extension to the property
